poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Belyi bai ban bianco blanco blank black White out. Cover-up. Wipe the slate clean. Fingerprint smear on the lens Pinot grigio vino verde vin blanc. Gringo-pink parents push pram- Loads of jellyfish-lilac blond infant. With a pail and calligraphy mop, in the park I'm writing in water on concrete. They pause.
